oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tennessee Infantry monument at Chickamauga
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thompson Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tennessee Infantry monument at Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park. Men in military uniforms with United States flags on jacket or holding flags, Specific event unknown. Possibly a copy photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments; Civil wars; Veterans; Military personnel; Military uniforms; Group portraits; Flags; Events;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
